Text:
.WITH EASY-INSTALLATION I MEAN LIKE THIS!
1.Unpack
2.Install
3.Run the "shortcut" from desktop
4.Have fun!
Gameplay works great on i7 2.8Ghz, but You have to configure graphic to d3D11 in ePSXe. CGi videos are black screen unfortunately. Thanks Velitha.
@Resycler, oh well i just tested it on WinXP tho but thanks for the info about DirextX11 Problem and let the others to know about it... No problem aswell!

I get error message in MS ZDOS screen when I click on the desktop shortcut it says 

"!Error video doesn't configurated
!Go Config->Video and chose plugin. "
nkununu, Open ePSXe and go to the config and select the Video Plugin and test yourself to the working one for you
